B2 to examine a crime, problem, statement, etc. carefully, especially to discover the truth: Police are investigating allegations of corruption involving senior executives. [ + question word ] We are of course investigating how an error like this could have occurred. Investigating further, we discovered that Carol was the person who took the call.
More examplesFewer examplesScotland Yard have been called in to investigate the murder.The remit of this official inquiry is to investigate the reasons for the accident.The government set up a commission to investigate the problem of inner city violence.The UN is investigating new methods of population control .I wonder what that noise was in the kitchen - I'd better go and investigate.
